channel.title: Video Editing Software
channel.description:
Does anyone know of any free-to-download video editing software that is fairly easy to learn the use of? I don't need many special effects. I just need to learn how to cut clips together, add sound effects, and overlay text on the scenes. is there anything out there that fits my needs? If I have to pay for it, is there anything cheap that fits my needs?
Also, is there anyone out there willing to help me learn said software and techniques that could be used with it?

item.description:
Woohoo! I found a solution to most of my problems! The squigglies were just a bad codec. It’s all good now though. I shouldn’t have any problems unless I run into a weird encrypted DVD.

In a couple of weeks I will be recording a theme song, and in the mean time I will be working on scripts and all of the editing for a couple of reviews. This will either be really fun, or really annoying. Either way it will be a lot of work, but I am hopeful for the best.
